name: Admin
description: Has full access to all dashboard features, including user and role management, reports, and system settings.

name: Manager
description: Manages gym operations, including memberships, schedules, and trainer assignments.

name: Trainer
description: Responsible for conducting training sessions and managing client progress.

name: Receptionist
description: Handles front desk operations, membership registrations, and member inquiries.

name: User
description: Regular gym member with access to workout schedules, personal progress, and bookings.

name: Cleaner
description: Responsible for maintaining cleanliness and hygiene in the gym premises.
